text: nam avarutaiya pirarttanaiyai erruk kontom; avarukkaka avarutaiya manaiviyai (malattut tanattai nikki) cukappatutti, avarukku yahyavaiyum alittom; niccayamaka ivarkal yavarum nanmaikal ceyvatil viraipavarkalaka iruntarkal - innum, avarkal nam'mai acai kontum, payattotum pirarttittarkal. Melum, avarkal nam'mitam ullaccam kontavarkalaka iruntarkal
